text: The Cuban war against the Spanish was the conflict that led to the independence of the island nation from the Spanish kingdom in 1898. In 1895, José Martí led what was called El Grito de Baire or the Cry of Baire which led to the beginning of the War. In Cuba the war is called the Necessary War, while in Spain they call it the War on Cuba. Category:1890s Category:History of Cuba
title: Cuba War
